title: Graves autoattacks graphic range bug
body:
Hi guys,
I have noticed that grves autoattacks have a graphic bug if tzhey attack a structure in the enemys base.
1 play graves 
2 stand directly infront a turret or inhibitor in the enemys base
3 attack the structure
4 other guys will now see a big yellow-orange range behind the turret or inhib if they dont have there monitor center on graves.
I hope it is explanation enough!!
can u see this bug 2???
